1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
4{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
5
6-- | Line-like token-level structure of source code.
7
8module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Clause
9  ( -- * Data type
10    Clause (..),
11    ClauseHead (..),
12    ClauseBody (..),
13  
14    -- * Functions
15    clauseTypeText,
16    consClause,
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Data.Char                              as Ch
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture               as O
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                   as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                 as S
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                   as T
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap            as C
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern         as P
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Message           as Msg
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource.Message  as Msg
28
29
30-- ----------------------  Data type
31
32-- | Line-like structure of source code.
33data Clause t = Clause
34    { clauseHead    :: ClauseHead t   -- ^ Common part of the clause.
35    , clauseBody    :: ClauseBody t   -- ^ Proper part of the clause.
36    } deriving (Show)
37
38-- | Common part of clause.
39data ClauseHead t = ClauseHead
40    { clauseSecNo   :: C.SecNo          -- ^ Section number of the clause.
41    , clauseShort   :: [S.ShortDef t]   -- ^ Short setting.
42    , clauseAbout   :: [S.TToken t]     -- ^ About setting.
43    , clauseSource  :: S.TokenClause t  -- ^ Source code of the clause.
44    } deriving (Show)
45
46-- | Proper part of clause.
47data ClauseBody t
48    = CJudge    T.AssertType S.JudgeClass
49                       [S.TToken t]    -- ^ __Relational:__ Judge
50    | CAssert   T.AssertType S.JudgeClass
51                       [S.TToken t]    -- ^ __Relational:__ Assertion
52    | CRelmap   String [S.TToken t]    -- ^ __Relational:__ Source of relmap
53    | CSlot     String [S.TToken t]    -- ^ __Relational:__ Global slot
54
55    | CInput    [S.TToken t]           -- ^ __Resource:__ Input point
56    | COutput   [S.TToken t]           -- ^ __Resource:__ Output point
57    | COption   [S.TToken t]           -- ^ __Resource:__ Option settings
58    | CExport   String                 -- ^ __Resource:__ Exporting name
59
60    | CEcho     (S.TokenClause t)      -- ^ __Other:__ Echo text
61    | CLicense  String                 -- ^ __Other:__ License text
62    | CBodies   [ClauseBody t]         -- ^ __Other:__ Multiple bodies
63    | CUnknown  (B.Ab ())              -- ^ __Other:__ Unknown clause
64      deriving (Show)
65
66-- | The empty clause heading.
67instance B.Default (ClauseHead t) where
68    def = ClauseHead { clauseSecNo  = 0
69                     , clauseShort  = []
70                     , clauseAbout  = []
71                     , clauseSource = B.def }
72
73instance (O.Textual t) => B.GetCodePos (Clause t) where
74    getCPs = B.getCPs . clauseHead
75
76instance (O.Textual t) => B.GetCodePos (ClauseHead t) where
77    getCPs = B.getCPs . clauseSource
78
79-- | Name of clause type. e.g., @\"relmap\"@, @\"assert\"@.
80clauseTypeText :: Clause t -> String
81clauseTypeText (Clause _ body) =
82    case body of
83      CInput    _       -> "input"
84      CExport   _       -> "export"
85      CRelmap   _ _     -> "relmap"
86      CAssert   _ _ _   -> "assert"
87      CJudge    _ _ _   -> "judge"
88      CSlot     _ _     -> "slot"
89      COption   _       -> "option"
90      COutput   _       -> "output"
91      CEcho     _       -> "echo"
92      CLicense  _       -> "license"
93      CBodies   _       -> "bodies"
94      CUnknown  _       -> "unknown"
95
96
97-- ----------------------  Construction
98
99-- | Convert token list into clause list.
100--   Result clause list does not contain
101--   'CRelmap' and 'CAssert'. Instead of them,
102--   'TTokmap' and 'CAssert' are contained.
103--   This function does not depend on 'C.ConsLexmap'.
104--
105--   >>> consClause . B.tokenize $ "a : source A /x /y"
106--   [ TTokmap ( TokenClause
107--                [TText 1 0 "a", TSpace 2 1, ..., TTerm 11 ["/y"]]
108--                [CodeLine 1 "a : source A /x /y" [TText 1 0 "a", ...]] )
109--            "a" [ TText 5 0 "source"
110--                , TText 7 0 "A"
111--                , TTerm 9 ["/x"]
112--                , TTerm 11 ["/y"]
113--                ]]
114
115-- | First step of constructing 'Resource'.
116consClause :: (O.Textual t) => [S.TToken t] -> C.SecNo -> [S.TokenLine t] -> [Clause t]
117consClause resAbout sec = loop h0 . S.tokenClauses where
118    h0 = B.def { clauseSecNo = sec }
119
120    loop _ []     = []
121    loop h (x:xs) = case consClauseEach resAbout $ h { clauseSource = x } of
122                      (Clause h1 (CBodies bs), h2) ->
123                          (Clause h1 <$> bs) ++ loop h2 xs
124                      (c, h2)  -> c : loop h2 xs
125
126consClauseEach :: forall t. (O.Textual t) => [S.TToken t] -> ClauseHead t -> (Clause t, ClauseHead t)
127consClauseEach resAbout h@(ClauseHead sec sh about src) = rslt where
128
129    rslt = case tokens of
130             Right ts                    -> dispatch ts
131             Left tok@(S.TUnknown _ _ a) -> unkClause [tok] $ Left a
132             Left tok@(S.TShort _ pre _) -> unkClause [tok] $ Msg.unresPrefix $ O.tString pre
133             Left tok                    -> unkClause [tok] $ Msg.bug "clause"
134
135    tokens | O.some unks    = Left $ head unks     -- include unknown tokens
136           | O.some sh      = mapM unshorten orig  -- unshorten short tokens
137           | O.some shorts  = Left $ head shorts   -- include short tokens
138           | otherwise      = Right orig
139
140    unshorten :: S.TToken t -> Either (S.TToken t) (S.TToken t)
141    unshorten t@(S.TShort n pre b) =
142        case lookup pre sh of
143          Just l  -> Right $ S.TText n S.TextQQ (l O.++ b)
144          Nothing -> Left t
145    unshorten t = Right t
146
147    -- ----------------------  Utility
148
149    orig           = B.clauseTokens src
150    checks         = filter checkToken orig
151    unks           = filter S.isUnknownToken checks
152    shorts         = filter S.isShortToken checks
153    checkToken t   = S.isUnknownToken t || S.isShortToken t
154    isDelim        = ( `elem` ["=", ":", "|"] )
155    lower          = O.tMap Ch.toLower
156    empty          = CBodies []
157    unkClause ts a = clause $ CUnknown $ unk ts a
158
159    -- ----------------------  Clause dispatcher
160
161    dispatch :: [S.TToken t] -> (Clause t, ClauseHead t)
162    dispatch (P.TBar (O.cut -> O.Jp '|' k) : xs)   -- Frege's judgement stroke
163                                    = clause   $ frege (lower k) xs
164    dispatch (P.TRaw name : P.TRaw is : body)
165        | isDelim is                = clause   $ CRelmap (O.tString name) body
166    dispatch (P.TRaw eq : _) | eq == "==="
167                                    = newSec
168    dispatch (P.TRaw k : xs)
169        | k == "input"              = clause   $ CInput xs
170        | k == "include"            = clause   $ CInput xs
171        | k == "export"             = clause   $ expt xs
172        | k == "short"              = newShort $ short xs
173        | k == "about"              = newAbout xs
174        | k == "option"             = clause   $ COption xs
175        | k == "output"             = clause   $ COutput xs
176        | k == "echo"               = clause   $ CEcho src
177        | k == "****"               = clause   $ empty
178    dispatch (S.TSlot _ 2 n : xs)   = clause   $ CSlot (O.tString n) xs
179    dispatch []                     = clause   $ empty
180    dispatch [P.TLicense ln]        = clause   $ CLicense $ O.tString $ O.trimEnd ln
181    dispatch _                      = clause   $ CUnknown $ unkAtStart []
182
183    -- Return form
184    clause :: ClauseBody t -> (Clause t, ClauseHead t)
185    clause b           = (Clause h b, h)
186    newSec             = (Clause h empty, h { clauseSecNo = sec + 1 })
187    newShort (sh', b)  = (Clause h b,     h { clauseShort = sh' })
188    newAbout about'    = (Clause h empty, h { clauseAbout = about' })
189
190    -- Error messages
191    unk ts msg     = let cp = B.getCPs $ B.headNull (head orig) ts
192                     in Msg.abClause cp msg
193    unkAt ts xs    = unk ts $ Msg.unkClause xs
194    unkAtStart     = unkAt orig
195    unkEEA e f a   = unkAtStart $ Msg.expect2Actual e f a
196
197    -- ----------------------  Judgement or assertion
198
199    -- Frege's content lines, or logical qualities
200    frege :: t -> [S.TToken t] -> ClauseBody t
201    frege "--"     = judge T.AssertAffirm
202    frege "-x"     = judge T.AssertDeny
203    frege "-xx"    = judge T.AssertMultiDeny
204    frege "-c"     = judge T.AssertChange
205    frege "-cc"    = judge T.AssertMultiChange
206    frege "-v"     = judge T.AssertViolate
207
208    frege "=="     = assert T.AssertAffirm
209    frege "=x"     = assert T.AssertDeny
210    frege "=xx"    = assert T.AssertMultiDeny
211    frege "=c"     = assert T.AssertChange
212    frege "=cc"    = assert T.AssertMultiChange
213    frege "=v"     = assert T.AssertViolate
214
215    frege s        = const $ CUnknown $ unkEEA
216                             "|--, |-x, |-xx, |-c, |-cc, |-v,"
217                             "  or |=x, |=xx, |=c, |=cc, |=v"
218                             ("|" O.++ O.tString s)
219
220    -- Judgement
221    judge q (P.T _ p : xs)  = CJudge q (O.tString p) $ addAbout xs
222    judge _ ts              = CUnknown $ judgeError ts
223
224    judgeError []           = unkAtStart ["Give a judgement pattern"]
225    judgeError ts           = unkAt ts ["Use text in judgement pattern"]
226
227    addAbout xs
228        | null resAbout && null about  = xs
229        | otherwise                    = resAbout ++ about ++ xs
230
231    -- Assertion
232    assert q (P.T _ p : xs) =
233        case S.splitTokensBy isDelim xs of
234          Just (_, _, expr)      -> a expr
235          Nothing                -> a xs
236        where a expr              = CAssert q (O.tString p) expr
237    assert _ ts                   = CUnknown $ judgeError ts
238
239    -- ----------------------  Short signs
240
241    short xs  = case wordPairs xs of
242                  Just sh'  -> (sh', shortCheck sh')
243                  Nothing   -> (sh, CUnknown $ unkAtStart [])
244
245    shortCheck :: [S.ShortDef t] -> ClauseBody t
246    shortCheck sh'
247        | O.some prefix    = abort $ Msg.dupPrefix prefix
248        | O.some replace   = abort $ Msg.dupReplacement replace
249        | O.some invalid   = abort $ Msg.invalidPrefix invalid
250        | otherwise        = empty
251        where (pre, rep)   = unzip sh'
252              prefix       = B.duplicates pre
253              replace      = B.duplicates rep
254              invalid      = B.omit isShortPrefix pre
255              abort msg    = CUnknown $ unk orig msg
256
257    -- Others
258    expt (P.T _ n : P.T _ ":" : xs)
259                       = CBodies [CExport $ O.tString n, CRelmap (O.tString n) xs]
260    expt [P.T _ n]     = CExport $ O.tString n
261    expt _             = CUnknown $ unkAtStart []
262
263-- | Test string is short prefix.
264isShortPrefix :: (O.Textual t) => O.Test t
265isShortPrefix = O.tAll Ch.isAlpha
266
267pairs :: [a] -> Maybe [(a, a)]
268pairs (a:b:cs)  = do cs' <- pairs cs
269                     Just $ (a, b) : cs'
270pairs []        = Just []
271pairs _         = Nothing
272
273wordPairs :: [S.TToken t] -> Maybe [(t, t)]
274wordPairs toks =
275    do ps <- pairs toks
276       mapM wordPair ps
277    where
278      wordPair (P.T _ a, P.T _ b) = Just (a, b)
279      wordPair _ = Nothing
280
